name: Churdhar Trek, Sirmaur
description: Churdhar Peak is located in the Sirmour district of Himachal Pradesh.The Churdhar Peak trek is the highest peak of outside Himalayan range with a modest elevation of 12,000 ft.

name: Indrahar Pass, Kangra
description: Indrahar Pass trek is one of the easy to moderate treks in Himachal Pradesh which is started from McLeodganj himachal pradesh.

name: Triund,Kangra
description: Triund trek is a about 9 kilometre hike that can be completed in 4-6 hours, making it possible to complete it in a single day,although the ideal way to complete it is to...

name: Himani Chamunda
description: Aadi Himani Chamunda temple is a distance of approx 14 km from Dharamshala. It is located in Kangra district of Himachal Pradesh.

name: Hampta Pass,Kullu
description: About 35 kilometres are required for the entire Hampta pass hike. Manali-jobra-Jwara-Balu-ka-Ghera-Hampta pass-Shea Goru-Chatru-Manali is the trek's route. In 5 days, you'll finish the trek.

name: Kheerganga,Kullu
description: The Kheerganga Trek is situated in Parvati Valley, covers a distance of 26 km. it is located in kullu Himachal pradesh.

name: Saach Pass, Pangi,Chamba
description: The remote Sach Pass trip is located in Himachal Pradesh's Chamba region, in the Pir Panjal Mountains.

name: Pin Parvati,Kullu
description: The crossing between Spiti's Pin Valley and Kullu's Parvati Valley bears the name Pin Parvati crossing.The 11-day, adventurous trek begins in Kullu and ends in Manali.
